apply_filter_button: QPushButton {color: rgb(69, 119, 185);border: 2px solid rgb(241, 241, 241);border-radius: 10px;background-color: rgb(241, 241, 241);} QPushButton:hover {color: white;background-color: darkgray;}
master_table: QTableView {color: rgb(89, 89, 89);font-size: 14px;font-family: Segoe UI;border: 2px solid black} QTableView QAbstractItemView::item {padding-left: 10px;}
